remarks: The image of a quotient by the ` QQHom ` homomorphism.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Oct-2017.)
statement:
qqhval2.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
qqhval2.1 $e |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) $.
qqhval2.2 $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` R ) $.
qqhvq $p |- ( ( ( R e. DivRing /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) /\ ( X e. ZZ /\ Y e. ZZ /\ Y =/= 0 ) ) -> ( ( QQHom ` R ) ` ( X / Y ) ) = ( ( L ` X ) ./ ( L ` Y ) ) ) $.
